title: Best early Black Friday Apple deals
content:
Macworld

If you’re looking for an Apple deal, there’s no better time to get one than Black Friday weekend. No matter what you’re looking to buy, you are likely to find a great price on it—possibly the lowest ever.

But Black Friday isn’t just one weekend. We see deals starting in early November and culminating in the post-Thanksgiving weekend from Friday, November 24 to Cyber Monday on Monday, November 27. In the weeks leading up to Black Friday, we expect to see some truly fantastic deals—and as you can see below, the bargains already starting. Here are the best prices leading up to the big shopping extravaganza.

Black Friday 2023: Apple’s shopping event

Every year Apple holds a four-day shopping event from Black Friday (November 24) to Cyber Monday (November 27). However, since Apple rarely discounts its products, the event consists of gift card offers rather than actual savings. Usually, the newest products are excluded, so don’t expect any offers on the iPhone 15, Apple Watch Series 9, or M3 MacBooks.

But if you like to shop at the Apple Store, it’s the best time to buy. The best deal from Apple’s Black Friday 2022 shopping event was the iPhone 12, which cost $599/£649 and came with a $50/£50 gift card. You could also get a $50/£50 gift card when you buy an Apple Watch SE, which starts at $249/£259. We expect to see similar deals this year on older iPhones and other products.

Black Friday 2023: Best Apple deals

We’re constantly tracking the best Apple deals, so stay tuned to this list for the best bargains we find.

Black Friday 2023: Where to shop for Apple deals

Stay tuned to Macworld throughout November to find the best deals as they arrive. But if you’re looking for a specific color or capacity, you can check out the following retailers. In the U.S., here are the best stores to shop for Black Friday deals:

  • Apple
  • Amazon
  • Best Buy
  • Costco
  • Target
  • Walmart

If you’re based in the U.K., you’ll find deals at the following shops:

  • Apple
  • AO.com
  • Amazon
  • Argos
  • Carphone Warehouse
  • Currys
  • eBuyer
  • John Lewis
  • KRCS
  • Laptops Direct
  • Very
